channel.title: Comments on: Get Involved With WordCamp Utah!

item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
@Shaun -
Yes, this is still happening. I'll have more to announce once the location has been confirmed.
item.content:encoded:
@Shaun –

Yes, this is still happening. I’ll have more to announce once the location has been confirmed.

item.title: By: Shaun
item.dc:creator: Shaun
item.description: So is this still going to happen? I haven't been able to find anything else on it. My company just recently decided to make Wordpress the content management system for one of our sites and I could really use a chance to learn more about the program myself.
item.content:encoded: So is this still going to happen? I haven’t been able to find anything else on it. My company just recently decided to make WordPress the content management system for one of our sites and I could really use a chance to learn more about the program myself.

item.title: By: Charlie Oliver
item.dc:creator: Charlie Oliver
item.description: Can't make it, but looking forward to the main event! Good luck on finding all the required essentials!
item.content:encoded:
Can’t make it, but looking forward to the main event!
Good luck on finding all the required essentials!

item.title: By: Sheri
item.dc:creator: Sheri
item.description: I'm in. Looking forward to WordCamp Utah already.
item.content:encoded: I’m in. Looking forward to WordCamp Utah already.

item.title: By: WizzKid
item.dc:creator: WizzKid
item.description:
I'de love to, but I am all the way in Sunny Scotland :)
Good luck with it,
Take care,
Neil
